text: Suhoor () is also called Sehri, Sahari, "'suhoor"', "'pisht lamae"' and "'pishmaney"' in other languages. It is an Islamic term referring to the meal had early in the morning by Muslims before fasting. It is recommended for Muslims to eat Complex carbohydrates. ==Related pages== *Iftar Category:Ramadan Category:Arabic words and phrases
title: Suhoor
